channel.title: Run Server Error
channel.description:
When I have my server running and I login i get this error and then i get kicked off.Any help?
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String ind ex out of range: 23 at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at client.savemoreinfo(Unknown Source) at client.process(Unknown Source) at PlayerHandler.process(Unknown Source) at server.main(Unknown Source)

item.title: Run Server Error
